title: What is a low profile antenna? - Quora

response.answer_text: Low profile can mean difficult to see or just not unusual. Undercover Police car can look like a ciop car but with a small profile antenna, just appears to be normal. Something that attracts no attention. Can also be applied to homes. Deed restrictions of properties where nothing outside of building is used. A skinny wire discreetly placed can be a low profile antenna. W2HP

low profile means small height and width; A profile is a side view, often defined as 90 degrees from the front or back view. it has high input impedance, for example A microstrip patch antenna or a cavity antenna is low profile A microstrip patch antenna is a low-profile directional radio antenna that is used for indoor locations covering single-floor offices, stores and small studios
